title: Use uploaded images in Pride Moments carousel

requirements.text: Add the 5 user-uploaded images (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) to the frontend static assets so they can be referenced by the Pride Moments carousel.
acceptanceCriteria: The files im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, and im1-5.jpg exist in the built frontend as static assets (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/).
All 5 images can be loaded directly via their asset URLs in the browser without 404 errors.

requirements.text: Update Pride Moments content to use the uploaded images in the carousel by replacing the existing Pride Moments event image sources with /assets/im1-3.jpg, /assets/im2-3.jpg, /assets/im1-4.jpg, /assets/im2-4.jpg, and /assets/im1-5.jpg (keeping meaningful English alt text for each image).
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts references exactly the 5 uploaded image filenames (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) in the Pride Moments event images array.
The Pride Moments section carousel displays 5 distinct slides corresponding to the 5 uploaded images.

requirements.text: Ensure the Pride Moments carousel remains fully manual (no auto-advance) and users can navigate through all provided images using previous/next buttons and indicators.
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel does not automatically change slides over time or based on visibility.
Clicking Next cycles through all 5 images and wraps from the last image back to the first.
Clicking Previous cycles through all 5 images and wraps from the first image to the last.
Clicking an indicator dot navigates to the corresponding image index.
When there is more than one image, navigation controls (previous/next + indicators) are visible and functional.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not add any backend dependency or backend logic for serving carousel images; images must be served as frontend static assets.
nonGoals: Changing Pride Moments section text content (title/subtitle/description/details) beyond what is necessary to update image sources and alt text.
Implementing image upload functionality inside the app UI.
